data.actual_result: The sheet stays open until the presence update signal has been successfully emitted through the gateway. This may result in the sheet closing with a considerable delay, or even not closing at all, depending on your connection, and depending on whether the presence update succeeds or fails (in which case the sheet wouldn't close)
data.expected_result: The sheet should close as soon as you select the new presence, and then the presence should update asynchronously
data.short_description: The change status sheet waits for the presence to be actually applied before closing
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a throttled connection. You can also turn off your connection completely after loading the app - Change presence status
